text: Sholola balia baboolelwa mbu; “Yikalile mutile emikhono chienyu, ne mutile iswala ne murusie eshihanwa, Ne olwa balomesibwa okhupana, awo omukanda kundi mubo nikuria Abandu shinga okhuria Nyasaye, nohomba ukhuria okhukhongo muno. Mana nibaboola; “Nyasaye wefu shichila shina nokhunichilisia okhupana? Manyanga wakhakhusitiliyekhwo imbeli khubise bititi butswa endi. Boola : “omwikhoyo kwo khushialo nimututu butswa, ne mwikulu ni indayi muno khu ulia uria Nyasaye. Ne shimulikholelwa obubii kata obutiti shinga uluusi lwolufwa lweitende tawe
